content.rendered:
Directed by John Ridley. Wendey Stanzler. Carlton Cuse.

Written by Carlton Cuse. Carlton Cuse. Sheri Fink. John Ridley. John Ridley.

Cast  Cherry Jones( Susan Mulderick). Cornelius Smith Jr.( Dr. Bryant King). Robert Pine( Dr. Horace Baltz). Adepero Oduye( Karen Wynn). Julie Ann Emery( Diane Robichaux). Michael Gaston( Arthur ‘Butch’ Schafer). Molly Hager( Virginia Rider). Stephen Bogaert( RenÃ© Goux) . Sharron Matthews( Cheri Landry). Damon Standifer( Emmett Everett). Sarah Allen( Lori Budo). W. Earl Brown( Ewing Cook). Jeremiah Oh( Ken Nakamaru). Tammy Isbell( Gina Isbell). Katie Boland( Kristy Johnson). Darrin Baker( Dr. Martin Bisley). Diane Johnstone( Wilda McManus). JD Evermore( Mark LeBlanc). Ted Atherton( Richard Deichmann). Raven Dauda( Angela McManus). Deborah Hay( Therese Mendez). Monica Wyche( Sandra LeBlanc). Ryan Allen( Drew Charles). Ma-Anne Dionisio( Jane DiMaapi). Jessica Greco( Sandra Cordray). Jessica B. Hill( Dr. Kathleen Fournier) . Dawn Greenhalgh( Elvira ‘Vera’ LeBlanc). Joy Tanner( Jill). Malube Uhindu-Gingala( Tarika Hill). Joe Carroll( Michael Arvin). Joel Keller( Eric Yancovich). Nola Augustson( Minnie Cook). Diego Fuentes( Freddy). Tre Smith( Troye). Lorna Wilson( Susan Mulderick’s Mother). Jeffrey Nordling( Richard T. Simmons, Jr.). Jonathan Cake( Vince Pou). Beth Malone( Linda Schafer). Colin Doyle( Dr. Barbour). Alexandra Castillo( Marcia Tellez). Lanette Ware( Carrie Everett). Paulino Nunes( Steven Jones). Michael Gordin Shore( Dr. Levinson). John Diehl( Frank Minyard). Tom Irwin( Walker Shaw). James Moses Black( Guidry). Terrence Clowe( Brosset). Kabir Bageria( Reporter) . Ervin Ross( Rodney Scott). Philip Craig( Attorney General Charles Foti, Jr.). Derek Gilroy( Security Supervisor). Jason Gray( LaFontaine) . Jameson Kraemer( Wheatly). Natasha Mumba( Tiana Colburn). Mark Winnick( Gun Doctor). Anthony Michael Frederick( State Agent). Tiara Johnny( Minyard’s Assistant). Ean Castellanos( Michael Morales). Bruce Katzman( Cyril Wecht). Aidan Devine( Bowles). Lena Clark( Woman Fraud Investigator). Ellison Booker( Car Wash Attendant). Jessica Blackmore( TV Reporter). Lili Connor( Allyson). Jhene Erwin( Laura Poincy). John Boylan( Michael Baden). Evan Annisette( Highwater National Guardsman). Lisa Andry-Dargel( Allyson’s Mother). James Coburn( Fundraiser Host). Taylor Davidson( Waitress). Jonathan Eliot( Steven Campanini). Durward Allan( Patient with Diaper). Gina Cottreau( Joleen). Sean Gallagher( Dr. Elwood McGee). Alexandra Floras-Matic( Monica) . Janet Land( Mrs. Allen). Jency Griffin Hogan( Reporter #4 (DA Offices)). Mike Capozzi( Stanz). Tiana Leonty( Investigator #1). Daniel Falk( ICU Staff). Jake Goldsbie( Doctor on ER Ramp). Beth Hornby( Kris Wartelle). Erin Mackinnon( Elise Campbell). Drew Nelson( Nick Edmunds). Lucky Johnson( Freddie Childs). Stephen Tyler Howell( Reporter (Simmons’ Conference)). Gordon Fulton( Mr. Hill). Kate Drummond( Lily). Redd Ochoa( Investigator #2). Kenneth Israel( Judge Calvin Johnson). Natalie Gallard( Search Team Member #2). Julian De Zotti( Carson). Teddy Kellogg( Schafer Family Male Member). Bryan Hatt( Corman). Andy Fraser( Neonate Doctor). Penelope Goranson( Female Patient). Vickie Papavs( Patsy). Keith Kemps( Robert Middleberg). Tony Kim( Nurse #5). Gretchen Koerner( Jury Foreperson). Liam Kinahan( Schafer’s Nephew). David Fish( Bron). Bryan Hindle( Matt). Dwight McFee( Morley Safer). Ashton James( Tony). Raevv’n Leedham( Attorney General’s Secretary). Cihang Ma( Andrea Chu). Marisa McIntyre( Reporter #2 (Foti Conference)). Chris George( Capacity Crewman). Joel Lacoursiere( Search Team Member #1). Becky Grimman( Beth). Shauna MacDonald( Audrey Adams). Casey Hendershot( Fire Fighter Jimmy). Brian Paul( Dan Nuss). Douglas E. Hughes( Banks). Glenda MacInnis( Callie Fredericks). Colin Price( Search Team Member #3). Dwayne A. Thomas( DA Eddie Jordan). Paul McGuire( On Air Host). Thomas Mitchell( Larso). Colin McLeod( Taylor). Michael Morrone( Johnson Boat Officer #2). James Yeargain( Reporter #3 (DA Offices)). Louise Kerr( ER Ramp Patient). Ivan D. Ossa( Tony’s Friend #2 )

Language English.

Producers Carlton Cuse. Greg Edmunds. Gregory Fein. Sheri Fink. Emma Forman. Ra’uf Glasgow. Lisa Kussner. Jan Peter Meyboom. Libby Minarik. John Ridley.

Production ABC Signature. International Famous Players Radio Picture Corporation. Scott Rudin Productions.

Creator Carlton Cuse. John Ridley.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status Finished (2022–2022)
